Text.Page:
Ruanal has been asking for help in the Halls of Gloom. I think he just gets lonely in there. I know I would.

Anyway, report to him.

Rotting bodies everywhere I look. What's worse, they never stop moving. You have to do something.

{@LinkCreature:20#30011002#Cruel taskmasters} and {@LinkCreature:20#30011001#slave overseers} have been forcing the {@LinkCreature:20#30039000#zomporis} to mine thermionic deposit nodes around here for quite some time. I don't know what they intend to do with all that ore, but history tells me the answer won't make me dance for joy.

Get rid of them all—slaves and masters alike—and collect any thermionic deposit nuggets they've gathered. Studying the nuggets might tell us what they're up to.

Did Ruanal send this ore? This is something new.

I'll send it off for examination straightaway.

Good job.
I heard Ruanal has something he wants me to see?
